name: Because things grow
description:
Because Things Grow 

a game by Lena Voß, done in 48h at Franken Game Jam 2021.

Controls

A: grow left cube
D: grow right cube
S: swap size


Music 

Spatium by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
